common.name: 2. Aroshi
common.primary: 1/LR, bonus to shapeshift into random CR 2 creature until bonus to end or HP lost
common.secondary: 1/LR, bonus to shapeshift into random CR 1 creature until bonus to end or HP lost

common.name: 2. Somnius
common.foil: +1 global dmg w/ no adj foes

common.name: 3. Pherousa
common.primary: when downed, +5 global dmg for combat
common.secondary: when downed, +2 global dmg for combat

common.name: 1. Club & Hammer
common.primary: on club/hammer sub hit, target is pushed up to 15' away from you and knocked prone
common.secondary: on club/hammer sub hit, target is pushed up to 15' away from you

common.name: 2. Dart & Knife
common.primary: on dart/knife sub hit, target gets 8 P DoT, stacking until CON save
common.secondary: on dart/knife sub hit, target gets 4 P DoT, stacking until CON save

common.name: 3. Brawling & Shield
common.primary: on brawling/shield sub hit, target makes CON save or blind until CON save
common.secondary: on brawling/shield sub hit, target makes CON save or sluggish until CON save

common.name: 4. Polearm & Spear
common.primary: on polearm/spear sub hit, target gets -2 AC until start of your next turn
common.secondary: on polearm/spear sub hit, target gets -1 AC until start of your next turn

common.name: 5. Caster
common.primary: on caster sub hit, target has -8 non-phys res until end of your next turn
common.secondary: on caster sub hit, target has -4 non-phys res until end of your next turn

common.name: 6. Bow & Sling
common.primary: on bow/sling sub hit, target takes 8 P dmg for every 5' it moves or is moved/pushed until end of its next turn
common.secondary: on bow/sling sub hit, target takes 4 P dmg for every 5' it moves or is moved/pushed until end of its next turn

uncommon.name: 4. Mother
uncommon.primary: -6 global dmg on odd turns, +12 global dmg on even turns
uncommon.secondary: -2 global dmg on odd turns, +4 global dmg on even turns

uncommon.name: 7. Axe & Sword
uncommon.primary: on axe/sword sub hit, foe adj to target takes 9 S dmg
uncommon.secondary: on axe/sword sub hit, foe adj to target takes 5 S dmg

rare.name: 5. Gawdian
rare.primary: +5 global dmg vs targets who have dmg'd you since your last turn
rare.secondary: +2 global dmg vs targets who have dmg'd you since your last turn

rare.name: 8. Flail & Pick
rare.primary: on flail/pick sub hit, deal 8 additional base dmg per crit die with this wep
rare.secondary: on flail/pick sub hit, deal 4 additional base dmg per crit die with this wep
